reviews.text: I had been using this coconut oil for months, every time I got out of the shower. I even started using it on my 2 toddlers as their moisturizer after baths. I received a new order of it today, and noticed a chemical like smell when I first opened it but didn‚Äôt think anything of it (I was in a hurry to get back to the little ones) and applied it all over my body. Within minutes my skin was burning, I had to get back in the shower to wash it off. I put my nose to the bottle and it almost smelled like nail polish remover. I am very disappointed and so glad I had not put any of this oil on my children. I will no longer trust this brand and need to find a new one I can trust.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2025
reviews.title: Chemical smell & burn
